name: Metal Death
description:
#PROLOGUE#

Metal Death is about a kid who is dreaming.

In his dreams he has to solve puzzles so he dies in that specific episode of the dream, to be able to continue to another dream episode. And to finally, die, to be able to wake up!

#CONTROLS#

WASD = Move

J = Attack

K = Jump

Space = Pause & go to settings

L = Select

ESC = End game

#GAMEPLAY#
  • You have to reach the beam of light in the end of the stage that kills you.
  • Move blocks onto switches, jump over holes,  destroy angels with your scythe, get the key items to open certain doors to get you through the stages!
  • You can at times get help from a devil! He shoots angels for you, for a limited amount of time.  *As a bonus she can also join you in battle with a boss, if you solve the puzzles fast enough!*
#TEAM#
  • Bithium - the master of Metal Death, the crook of everything in this masterful piece
  • Rhysimus - the servant of Metal Death, a co-programmer and web-designer

*PS bugs are apparent, feedback appreciated!
